about_the_game:
Infested Lands is an addictive game that takes players to a dangerous world where monsters rule. The player takes on the role of a military man who has been sent to a territory known as the "Infested Lands" to investigate and destroy the monsters that inhabit this territory.



The game is a classic TDS shooter where you, as a hired worker, have to go to various locations and complete special tasks, destroying enemies.

Dressed in a camouflage uniform and armed with a machine gun, the hero will find himself in a dark and exciting atmosphere that will not leave you indifferent. In this world, you need to stay alert and ready to fight at any moment, because monsters can appear at any moment.



Defeating monsters and moving through the infected zone is the key task of the hero. During the game there will be many unpredictable moments and decisions that will have to be made quickly and without hesitation.

name: Infested Lands

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
